senses.definition: to temporarily get into one’s possession or control; to take to a place (see eģ for taking something from or away from)
to carry, to escort, to lead someone (esp. by means of a vehicle), to transport or accompany someone
examples: Elu vúð larjarúhvills! — I’ll take you if you can’t drive!

senses.definition: (intransitive) to lead to, to result in
examples: Vúszí leiga elum! — This path leads to nowhere!
Eiga eliszal? — Where are you taking me?

senses.definition: to work, to function (correctly); to act or behave (as intended)
examples: Miká elum? — How does it work?
